languages.text: {n}Духи машин разгневаны вашим вмешательством и пробуждают системы защиты. Спавшие до этого люмены над дверью расцветают охряно-красными огнями.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Духи машин разгневаны вашим вмешательством и пробуждают системы защиты. Спавшие до этого люмены над дверью расцветают охряно-красными огнями.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The machine spirits are angered by your intrusion and activate the defence systems. The previously sleeping lumens above the door blossom with amber lights.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Духи машин разгневаны вашим вмешательством и пробуждают системы защиты. Спавшие до этого люмены над дверью расцветают охряно-красными огнями.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The machine spirits are angered by your intrusion and activate the defense systems. The previously sleeping lumens above the door blossom with ocher-red lights.{/n}
{n}The machine spirits are angered by your intrusion and activate the defense systems. The previously sleeping lumens above the door blossom with ocher-red lights.{/n}
{n}The machine spirits are angered by your intrusion and activate the defence systems. The previously sleeping lumens above the door blossom with amber lights.{/n}
{n}The machine spirits are angered by your intrusion and activate the defence systems. The previously sleeping lumens above the door blossom with amber lights.{/n}
{n}The machine spirits are angered by your intrusion and activate the defence systems. The previously sleeping lumens above the door blossom with amber lights.{/n}

languages.text: {n}机魂被你的入侵行为激怒，启动了防御系统。大门上方原本黯淡的灯柱，突然绽放出了琥珀色的亮光。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The machine spirits are angered by your intrusion and activate the defence systems. The previously sleeping lumens above the door blossom with amber lights.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}机魂被你的入侵行为激怒，启动了防御系统。大门上方原本黯淡的灯柱，突然绽放出了琥珀色的亮光。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tu intrusión ofende a los espíritus máquina, que activan los sistemas de defensa. Los lumen que dormían encima de la puerta brillan con una luz ambarina.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The machine spirits are angered by your intrusion and activate the defence systems. The previously sleeping lumens above the door blossom with amber lights.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tu intrusión ofende a los espíritus máquina, que activan los sistemas de defensa. Los lumen que dormían encima de la puerta brillan con una luz ambarina.{/n}

languages.text: {n}機械精霊はあなたが侵入してきたことに怒り、防御システムを作動させる。ドアの上で眠っていたルーメンが、琥珀色の光の花を咲かせた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The machine spirits are angered by your intrusion and activate the defence systems. The previously sleeping lumens above the door blossom with amber lights.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}機械精霊はあなたが侵入してきたことに怒り、防御システムを作動させる。ドアの上で眠っていたルーメンが、琥珀色の光の花を咲かせた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Maschinengeister sind erzürnt über deine Störung und aktivieren die Verteidigungssysteme. Die bislang schlafenden Lumen über der Tür leuchten nun bernsteinfarben.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The machine spirits are angered by your intrusion and activate the defence systems. The previously sleeping lumens above the door blossom with amber lights.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Maschinengeister sind erzürnt über deine Störung und aktivieren die Verteidigungssysteme. Die bislang schlafenden Lumen über der Tür leuchten nun bernsteinfarben.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les esprits de la machine sont courroucés par votre intrusion et activent les systèmes de défense. Des lumières jusqu'alors dormantes au-dessus de la porte se mettent à diffuser un halo ambré.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The machine spirits are angered by your intrusion and activate the defence systems. The previously sleeping lumens above the door blossom with amber lights.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les esprits de la machine sont courroucés par votre intrusion et activent les systèmes de défense. Des lumières jusqu'alors dormantes au-dessus de la porte se mettent à diffuser un halo ambré.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Makine ruhları, zorla girdiğin için öfkelenip savunma sistemini devreye sokuyor. Kapının üzerindeki tembel lümenler, kehribar rengi ışıklarla parıldıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The machine spirits are angered by your intrusion and activate the defence systems. The previously sleeping lumens above the door blossom with amber lights.{/n}
